title: Red Grange
summary: Harold Edward "Red" Grange (June 13, 1903 â€“ January 28, 1991), nicknamed "The Galloping Ghost" and "The Wheaton Iceman", was an American football halfback for the University of Illinois, the Chicago Bears, and the short-lived New York Yankees.  His signing with the Bears helped legitimize the National Football League (NFL).[2]
